_comment: MasterDeck save file which contains the same Card values as in TypicalCards#getTypicalMasterDeck()

persons.question: What is a loop
persons.answer: A construct that repeats instructions until a condition is met

persons.question: What is a variable
persons.answer: A named memory location that stores a value

persons.question: What is the structure of an atom
persons.answer: Atoms consist of a nucleus containing protons and neutrons, surrounded by electrons in shells or energy levels

persons.question: What is the basic unit of life
persons.answer: The cell is the basic unit of life

persons.question: Who was the first president of the United States
What is an earthquake
persons.answer: An earthquake is a sudden and rapid shaking of the earth caused by the shifting of tectonic plates
